analysis.description:
BasicToken.totalSupply_ (/unique_chucks/8/0x0854dcbdcd026c0b534b09608adb3f2bf6baacd0.sol#102) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/8/0x0854dcbdcd026c0b534b09608adb3f2bf6baacd0.sol#107-109)

HadePayToken.mint (/unique_chucks/8/0x0854dcbdcd026c0b534b09608adb3f2bf6baacd0.sol#328-334) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-totalSupply.add(_value) (/unique_chucks/8/0x0854dcbdcd026c0b534b09608adb3f2bf6baacd0.sol#330-331)
	-balances[_to].add(_value) (/unique_chucks/8/0x0854dcbdcd026c0b534b09608adb3f2bf6baacd0.sol#331)

HadePayToken.burn (/unique_chucks/8/0x0854dcbdcd026c0b534b09608adb3f2bf6baacd0.sol#340-348) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-totalSupply.sub(_value) (/unique_chucks/8/0x0854dcbdcd026c0b534b09608adb3f2bf6baacd0.sol#342-344)
	-balances[msg.sender].sub(_value) (/unique_chucks/8/0x0854dcbdcd026c0b534b09608adb3f2bf6baacd0.sol#345-346)
